name: Crazy Hair Salon-Girl Makeover
description:
Welcome to the Crazy Hair Salon! We care for CRAZY hair! OMG! These pretty girls need a hair makeover ASAP! Can you help them out?! Run your own Salon! Choose from tons of styling activities! Curl, straighten, cut, color and more!

Give these pretty girls the craziest hairstyles ever! Enjoy tons of professional tools like curling irons, blow dryers, scissors, magic hair growing spray and so much more! You can even color these pretty girls’ hair in a variety of crazy cool colors. Long or short?! Curly or straight?! Aqua or Pink?! It’s all up to you at the Crazy Hair Salon!

Features:
> Choose from 4 pretty girls at the salon
> Curl hair with special curling iron
> Straighten your clients’ crazy hair with the straightener
> Cut and style hair with professional scissors
> Regrow hair with hair growing spray
> GO WILD! Choose from tons of CRAZY hair colors!
> Braid your clients’ pretty hair
> Tap to get rid of itchy lice
> Snap a picture to show off your client’s new look!
